title: Leeds Glass Recycling
strapline: Brought to you by Zero Waste Leeds
welcome_message: Last year we recycled over 12,000 tonnes of glass across our city – 37% more than the year before. Nice one Leeds! Did you know that our bottles and jars get recycled here in Yorkshire? Most become new bottles and jars, reducing CO₂ emissions and saving energy too. Find your nearest glass bank on our map and see how much glass people near you recycled last year - and how much energy all that recycling saved.
